name: Scientific Programmer Attacking Creatures Endlessly (S.P.A.C.E)
description:
Introduction:

Hi, this is officially my first upload in itch.io and it's for the GamePlusJam2 game jam. I worked on this project all by myself excluding some designs and all audio that's in the game. I programmed and designed the character and enemies and the attacks.

Brief Overview of the Game:

The jam went on for a week and wanted to create something simple yet somewhat fun. I was heavily inspired by Gunkid 99 and the mechanics of shooting and level progression so i tried to replicate it with my own twist and having gone with the theme of "Space".  It's simply a shooter where the player must survive and collect a certain amount of orbs to able to win the level. I didn't add a level progression due to limited time but that would've been the case of progressing throughout different levels.

Credits

Music - Sirius Beat (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzIvArw09BmICMQFC5EZv7w)
